title: Tough life
body:
That moment when you can't win your lane matchup, and your team forbids you from roaming, nor do they help.

And then report you for feeding as you are forced to stay in the said unwinnable lane without help and banned from other alternative strategies to make up for the situation.

Worse, the team also fed the guy that you had trouble going up against before you were locked in your lane. And I guess that somehow was meant to solve the problem?

Tough life.

replies.body: What can I say, life is tough and life is unfair.

> [{quoted}](name=Purplerain14,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=B6QOMMXP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-20T09:25:41.606+0000)
>
> What can I say, life is tough and life is unfair.

ayyy
